file.name: chargebacks.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: https://api.mercadopago.com
info:
  title: Mercado Pago API Reference
  version: '1.0'
paths:
  /v1/chargebacks/{id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-api'
      summary: Get chargeback
      x-summary-i18n:
        eng: Get chargeback
        spa: Obtener contracargo
        por: Obter estorno
      description: Check all the information related to a chargeback for your product or service with the ID of the chargeback you want
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Check all the information related to a chargeback for your product or service with the ID of the chargeback you want
        spa: Consulta toda la información de un contracargo de tu producto o servicio con el ID del contracargo que quieras
        por: Veja todas as informações de operações contestadas de seu produto ou serviço com a identificação do estorno que você deseja
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: Unique chargeback identifier
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Unique chargeback identifier
            spa: Identificador único del contracargo
            por: Identificador único do estorno
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "12123adfasdf123u4u"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                    description: Unique chargeback identifier
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Unique chargeback identifier
                      spa: Identificador único del contracargo
                      por: Identificador único do estorno
                  payments:
                    type: array
                    description: List of payments IDs associated to the case
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: List of payments IDs associated to the case
                      spa: Lista de pagos con IDs asociados al caso
                      por: Lista de IDs de pagamentos associados ao caso
                    items:
                      type: number
                  currency:
                    type: string
                    description: Chergeback amount currency
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Chergeback amount currency
                      spa: Moneda del monto de la contracargo
                      por: Moeda do valor do estorno
                  amount:
                    type: number
                    description: Chergeback amount
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Chergeback amount
                      spa: Monto de la contracargo
                      por: Valor do estorno
                  coverage_applied:
                    type: boolean
                    description: Whether the seller has been covered or not
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Whether the seller has been covered or not
                      spa: Si el vendedor ha sido cubierto o no
                      por: Se o vendedor está coberto ou não
                  coverage_elegible:
                    type: boolean
                    description: Indicates if the money returned to the buyer can be covered by Mercado Pago. It is only possible to continue with the rest of the steps if the chargeback can be covered.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Indicates if the money returned to the buyer can be covered by Mercado Pago. It is only possible to continue with the rest of the steps if the chargeback can be covered.
                      spa: Define si el dinero devuelto al comprador puede ser cubierto por Mercado Pago. Solo es posible continuar con el resto de los pasos si el contracargo puede ser cubierto.
                      por: Define se o dinheiro devolvido ao comprador pode ser coberto pelo Mercado Pago. Só é possível continuar com o restante das etapas se o estorno puder ser coberto.
                  documentation_required:
                    type: boolean
                    description: 
                      Whether the seller needs to send documentation for this chargeback
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Whether the seller needs to send documentation for this chargeback
                      spa: Si el vendedor debe enviar la documentación para el contracargo 
                      por: Se o vendedor precisa enviar a documentação para este estorno
                  documentation_status:
                    type: string
                    description: Detail of decision taken for the documentation
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Detail of decision taken for the documentation
                      spa: Detalle de la decisión tomada por la documentación
                      por: Detalhe da decisão tomada para a documentação
                    enum:
                      - pending -- No documentation has been received
                      - review_pending -- Documentation received, waiting for decision to be taken
                      - valid -- The documentation received is valid
                      - invalid -- The documentation received is invalid
                      - not_supplied -- The documentation wasn't supplied on time
                      - not_applicable -- Documentation wasn't needed for this chargeback
                  documentation:
                    type: array
                    description: List of documentation received from the seller
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: List of documentation received from the seller
                      spa: Lista de documentación recibida del vendedor
                      por: Lista de documentação recebida do vendedor
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        type:
                          type: string
                          description: Documentation's file type
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Documentation's file type
                            spa: Tipo de archivo de documentacion
                            por: Tipo de arquivo da documentação
                        url:
                          type: string
                          description: URL to see the documentation file
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: URL to see the documentation file
                            spa: URL para ver el archivo de documentación
                            por: URL para ver o arquivo da documentação
                        description:
                          type: string
                          description: Documentation's description
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Documentation's description
                            spa: Descripcion de la documentacion
                            por: Descrição da documentação
                  date_documentation_deadline:
                    type: string
                    format: date
                    description: Chargeback's last day to send documentation
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Chargeback's last day to send documentation
                      spa: Último día para el envío de documentación del contracargo
                      por: Último dia para o envio da documentação do estorno
                  date_created:
                    type: string
                    format: date
                    description: Chargeback’s creation date
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Chargeback’s creation date
                      spa: Fecha de creación del contracargo
                      por: Data de criação do Estorno
                  date_last_updated:
                    type: string
                    format: date
                    description: Chargeback's last modified date
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Chargeback's last modified date
                      spa: Fecha de última modificación del contracargo
                      por: Data da última modificação do estorno
                  live_mode:
                    type: boolean
                    description: Whether the chargeback will be processed in sandbox or in production mode. If TRUE, then the chargeback will be processed in production mode. If FALSE, then the chargeback will be processed in sandbox mode.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Whether the chargeback will be processed in sandbox or in production mode. If TRUE, then the chargeback will be processed in production mode. If FALSE, then the chargeback will be processed in sandbox mode.
                      spa: Si la devolución será procesada en el "sandbox" o en el modo de producción. Si es TRUE, el contracargo se procesará en modo de producción. Si es FALSE, el contracargo se procesará en modo sandbox.
                      por: Se o estorno será processada em modo sandbox ou em produção. Se TRUE, o estorno será processado em modo de produção. Se FALSE, o estorno será processado no modo sandbox.
  /v1/payments/{id}/refunds:
    get:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-api'
      summary: Get refunds list
      x-summary-i18n:
        eng: Get refunds list
        spa: Obtener lista de reembolsos
        por: Obter lista de reembolsos
      description: Get all Refunds for a specific payment
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Get all Refunds for a specific payment
        spa: Consultar todos los reembolsos para un pago específico
        por: Consultar todos os reembolsos para um pagamento específico
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: Payment identifier
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Payment identifier
            spa: Identificador de pago
            por: Identificador de pagamento
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 18552260055
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: number
                    example: 1032332129
                    description: Refund identifier
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Refund identifier
                      spa: Identificador de reembolso
                      por: Identificador do reembolso
                  payment_id:
                    type: number
                    example: 18552260055
                    description: Payment identifier
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Payment identifier
                      spa: Identificador de pago
                      por: Identificador de pagamento
                  amount:
                    type: number
                    example: 4
                    description: Payment identifier
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Payment identifier
                      spa: Identificador de pago
                      por: Identificador de pagamento
                  metadata:
                    type: array
                    description: Contains payment metadata that is sent to us in the payment post
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Contains payment metadata that is sent to us in the payment post
                      spa: Contiene metadatos del pago que nos envían en el post del payment
                      por: Contém metadados de pagamento que nos são enviados no post de payment
                    items:
                  source:
                    type: array
                    description: Contains the data to identify who originated the refund (contains ID, name and type)
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Contains the data to identify who originated the refund (contains ID, name and type)
                      spa: Contiene los datos para identificar quién originó el reembolso (contiene ID, name y type)
                      por: Contém os dados para identificar quem originou o reembolso (contém ID, nome e tipo)
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        name:
                          type: string
                          example: "Firstname Lastname"
                          x-example-i18n:
                            eng: Firstname Lastname
                            spa: Nombre y apellido
                            por: Nome e sobrenome
                          description: The name of the user who submitted the refund request  
                        id:
                          type: string
                          example: "1003743392"
                          description: The ID of the user who submitted the refund request (collector, operator, owner of the marketplace)
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: The ID of the user who submitted the refund request (collector, operator, owner of the marketplace)
                            spa: El ID del usuario que envió el pedido de reembolso (collector, operator, owner del marketplace)
                            por: O ID do usuário que enviou a solicitação de reembolso (coletor, operador e proprietário do marketplace)
                        type:
                          type: string
                          example: "collector"
                          description: Source type. The possible values are Admin, Collector, BPP, and Marketplace.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Source type. The possible values are Admin, Collector, BPP, and Marketplace.
                            spa: Tipo de fuente. Los valores posibles son Admin, Collector, BPP y Marketplace.
                            por: Tipo de fonte. Os valores possíveis são Admin, Collector, BPP e Marketplace.
                  date_created:
                    type: string
                    example: "2021-11-24T13:58:49.312-04:00"
                    format: date
                    description: Refund creation date
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Refund creation date
                      spa: Fecha de creación del reembolso
                      por: Data de criação do reembolso
                  unique_sequence_number:
                    type: string
                    example: null
                    description: It is an identifier of the refund that was generated by the card processor.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: It is an identifier of the refund that was generated by the card processor.
                      spa: Es un identificador del reembolso que generó el procesador de la tarjeta.
                      por: É um identificador do reembolso que foi gerado pelo processador do cartão.
                  refund_mode:
                    type: string
                    example: "standard"
                    description: Type of refund
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Type of refund
                      spa: Tipo de reembolso
                      por: Tipo de reembolso
                  adjustment_amount:
                    type: number
                    example: 0
                    description: Refund adjustment
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Refund adjustment
                      spa: Ajuste de reembolso
                      por: Ajuste de reembolso
                  status:
                    type: string
                    example: "approved"
                    description: Refund status
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Refund status
                      spa: Status de reembolso
                      por: Status de reembolso
                    enum:
                      - approved -- The payment has been approved and accredited.
                      - in_process -- Payment is being reviewed.
                      - rejected -- Payment was rejected. The user may retry payment.
                      - cancelled -- Payment was cancelled by one of the parties or because time for payment has expired.
                      - authorized -- The payment has been authorized but not captured yet.
                  reason:
                    type: string
                    example: null
                    description: Refund reason
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Refund reason
                      spa: Motivo de reembolso
                      por: Motivo do reembolso
                  label:
                    type: array
                    description: Information relevant to the refund. Currently only one label called hidden is used. When the payment search is made, refunds with the hidden label are not returned in the response JSON.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Information relevant to the refund. Currently only one label called hidden is used. When the payment search is made, refunds with the hidden label are not returned in the response JSON.
                      spa: Información pertinente al reembolso. Actualmente solo se usa una label llamada hidden. Cuando se hace la búsqueda del pago, en el JSON de respuesta no se devuelven los refunds que tienen el label hidden.
                      por: Informações relevantes para o reembolso. Atualmente, apenas uma label chamada hidden é usada. Quando a pesquisa de pagamento é feita, os reembolsos com o label hiddden não são retornados no JSON de resposta.
                    items:
                      type: object
                  partition_details:
                    type: array
                    description: Indicates the amount returned for each of the partitions with which the payment was generated. Currently, payments with several money partitions are created only for one product from Brazil (Valeras), so it does not apply to all. Valeras allows offering benefits to employees, and is currently turned on in Brazil only for some employers.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Indicates the amount returned for each of the partitions with which the payment was generated. Currently, payments with several money partitions are created only for one product from Brazil (Valeras), so it does not apply to all. Valeras allows offering benefits to employees, and is currently turned on in Brazil only for some employers.
                      spa: Indica el monto devuelto para cada una de las particiones con las que fue generado el pago. Actualmente solo para un producto de Brasil (Valeras) se crean pagos con varias particiones de dinero, por lo que no aplica a todos. Valeras permite ofrecer beneficios a empleados, y actualmente se encuentra encendido en Brasil solo para algunos empleadores.
                      por: Indica o valor devolvido para cada uma das partições com as quais o pagamento foi gerado. Atualmente apenas para um produto do Brasil (Valeras) são criados pagamentos com várias partições de dinheiro, portanto não se aplica a todos. O Valeras permite oferecer benefícios aos empregados e atualmente está ativo no Brasil apenas para alguns empregadores.
                    items:
                      type: object        
        '400':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 400--Bad-Request--missing-information-on-header-            
        '401':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 5--Must-provide-your-access-token-to -proceed--Valid-token-required-
        '404':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 2000--Payment-not-found--Payment_Id_does_not_exist-
    post:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-api'
      summary: Create refund
      x-summary-i18n:
        eng: Create refund
        spa: Crear reembolso
        por: Criar reembolso
      description: Create Partial/Full Refund for a specific payment. If the amount field is filled, it will create a partial refund, if not, it will create a full refund
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Create Partial/Full Refund for a specific payment. If the amount field is filled, it will create a partial refund, if not, it will create a full refund
        spa: Crear reembolsos parciales/totales para un pago específico. Si el campo de suma ha sido completado, creará un reembolso parcial, en caso contrario, creará un reembolso total
        por: Criar um reembolso parcial/total para um pagamento específico. Se o campo amount estiver preechido, será criado um reembolso parcial, caso contrário, se criará um reembolso total
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: Payment identifier
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Payment identifier
            spa: Identificador de pago
            por: Identificador de pagamento
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 12345678901
        - name: X-Idempotency-Key
          in: header
          description: Idempotency key. When used, avoids duplicated refund
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Idempotency key. When used, avoids duplicated refund
            spa: Idempotency key. Al usarse, evita los reembolsos duplicados
            por: Idempotency key. Quando usada, evita reembolsos duplicados
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 77e1c83b-7bb0-437b-bc50-a7a58e5660ac
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                amount:
                  type: number
                  description: Refund amount. If this property (amount) is removed from body, it will create a full refund.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Refund amount. If this property (amount) is removed from body, it will create a full refund.
                    spa: Monto de reembolso. Si esta propiedad (monto) es removida del body, creará un reembolso total.
                    por: Valor do reembolso. Se a propriedade (amount) for removida do body, criará um reembolso integral.
                  example: 5
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Sucess
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: number
                    example: 1009042015
                    description: Refund identifier
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Refund identifier
                      spa: Identificador de reembolso
                      por: Identificador do reembolso
                  payment_id:
                    type: number
                    example: 18552260055
                    description: Payment identifier
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Payment identifier
                      spa: Identificador de pago
                      por: Identificador de pagamento
                  amount:
                    type: number
                    example: 10
                    description: Refund amount
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Refund amount
                      spa: Monto de reembolso
                      por: Valor do reembolso
                  metadata:
                    type: array
                    description: Contains payment metadata that is sent to us in the payment post
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Contains payment metadata that is sent to us in the payment post
                      spa: Contiene metadatos del pago que nos envían en el post del payment
                      por: Contém metadados de pagamento que nos são enviados no post de payment
                    items:
                      type: object
                  source:
                    type: array
                    description: Contains the data to identify who originated the refund (contains ID, name and type)
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Contains the data to identify who originated the refund (contains ID, name and type)
                      spa: Contiene los datos para identificar quién originó el reembolso (contiene ID, name y type)
                      por: Contém os dados para identificar quem originou o reembolso (contém ID, nome e tipo)
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        name:
                          type: string
                          example: "Firstname Lastname"
                          x-example-i18n:
                            eng: Firstname Lastname
                            spa: Nombre y apellido
                            por: Nome e sobrenome
                          description: The name of the user who submitted the refund request  
                        id:
                          type: string
                          example: "1003743392"
                          description: The ID of the user who submitted the refund request (collector, operator, owner of the marketplace)
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: The ID of the user who submitted the refund request (collector, operator, owner of the marketplace)
                            spa: El ID del usuario que envió el pedido de reembolso (collector, operator, owner del marketplace)
                            por: O ID do usuário que enviou a solicitação de reembolso (coletor, operador e proprietário do marketplace)
                        type:
                          type: string
                          example: "collector"
                          description: Source type. The possible values are Admin, Collector, BPP, and Marketplace.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Source type. The possible values are Admin, Collector, BPP, and Marketplace.
                            spa: Tipo de fuente. Los valores posibles son Admin, Collector, BPP y Marketplace.
                            por: Tipo de fonte. Os valores possíveis são Admin, Collector, BPP e Marketplace.
                  date_created:
                    type: string
                    example: "2021-11-24T13:58:49.312-04:00"
                    format: date
                    description: Refund creation date
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Refund creation date
                      spa: Fecha de creación del reembolso
                      por: Data de criação do reembolso
                  unique_sequence_number:
                    type: string
                    example: null
                    description: It is an identifier of the refund that was generated by the card processor.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: It is an identifier of the refund that was generated by the card processor.
                      spa: Es un identificador del reembolso que generó el procesador de la tarjeta.
                      por: É um identificador do reembolso que foi gerado pelo processador do cartão.
                  refund_mode:
                    type: string
                    example: "standard"
                    description: Type of Refund
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Type of Refund
                      spa: Tipo de reembolso
                      por: Tipo de reembolso
                  adjustment_amount:
                    type: number
                    example: 0
                    description: Refund adjustment
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Refund adjustment
                      spa: Ajuste de reembolso
                      por: Ajuste de reembolso
                  status:
                    type: string
                    example: "approved"
                    description: Refund status
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Refund status
                      spa: Status de reembolso
                      por: Status de reembolso
                    enum:
                      - approved -- The payment has been approved and accredited.
                      - in_process -- Payment is being reviewed.
                      - rejected -- Payment was rejected. The user may retry payment.
                      - cancelled -- Payment was cancelled by one of the parties or because time for payment has expired.
                      - authorized -- The payment has been authorized but not captured yet.
                  reason:
                    type: string
                    example: null
                    description: Refund reason
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Refund reason
                      spa: Motivo de reembolso
                      por: Motivo do reembolso
                  label:
                    type: array
                    description: Information relevant to the refund. Currently only one label called hidden is used. When the payment search is made, refunds with the hidden label are not returned in the response JSON.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Information relevant to the refund. Currently only one label called hidden is used. When the payment search is made, refunds with the hidden label are not returned in the response JSON.
                      spa: Información pertinente al reembolso. Actualmente solo se usa una label llamada hidden. Cuando se hace la búsqueda del pago, en el JSON de respuesta no se devuelven los refunds que tienen el label hidden.
                      por: Informações relevantes para o reembolso. Atualmente, apenas uma label chamada hidden é usada. Quando a pesquisa de pagamento é feita, os reembolsos com o label hiddden não são retornados no JSON de resposta.
                    items:
                      type: object
                  partition_details:
                    type: array
                    description: Indicates the amount returned for each of the partitions with which the payment was generated. Currently, payments with several money partitions are created only for one product from Brazil (Valeras), so it does not apply to all. Valeras allows offering benefits to employees, and is currently turned on in Brazil only for some employers.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Indicates the amount returned for each of the partitions with which the payment was generated. Currently, payments with several money partitions are created only for one product from Brazil (Valeras), so it does not apply to all. Valeras allows offering benefits to employees, and is currently turned on in Brazil only for some employers.
                      spa: Indica el monto devuelto para cada una de las particiones con las que fue generado el pago. Actualmente solo para un producto de Brasil (Valeras) se crean pagos con varias particiones de dinero, por lo que no aplica a todos. Valeras permite ofrecer beneficios a empleados, y actualmente se encuentra encendido en Brasil solo para algunos empleadores.
                      por: Indica o valor devolvido para cada uma das partições com as quais o pagamento foi gerado. Atualmente apenas para um produto do Brasil (Valeras) são criados pagamentos com várias partições de dinheiro, portanto não se aplica a todos. O Valeras permite oferecer benefícios aos empregados e atualmente está ativo no Brasil apenas para alguns empregadores.
                    items:
                      type: object        
        '400':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 2063--The-action-requested-is-not-valid-for-the-current-payment-state--missing-information-on-header-or-the-payment-was-fully-refund-            
        '401':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 401--Invalid-token--Valid-token-required-
                      - 4040--amount-attribute-must-be-positive--Amount-should-be-more-than-0-
                      - 4041--amount-attribute-must-be-numeric--Amount-should-be-a-number-
        '404':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 2032--Refund-not-found--X-Idempontency-key-already-used-
                      - 2000--Payment-not-found--Payment_Id_does_not_exist-
  /v1/payments/{id}/refunds/{refund_id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-api'
      summary: Get specific refund
      x-summary-i18n:
        eng: Get specific refund
        spa: Obtener reembolso específico
        por: Obter reembolso específico
      description: Get a specific Refund from a specific payment
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Get a specific Refund from a specific payment
        spa: Consultar reembolso específico de un pago determinado
        por: Consultar reembolso específico de determinado pagamento
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: Payment identifier
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Payment identifier
            spa: Identificador de pago
            por: Identificador de pagamento
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 18552260055
        - name: refund_id
          in: path
          description: Refund identifier
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Refund identifier
            spa: Identificador de reembolso
            por: Identificador do reembolso
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 1032332129
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Sucess
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: number
                    example: 1032332129
                    description: Refund identifier
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Refund identifier
                      spa: Identificador de reembolso
                      por: Identificador do reembolso
                  payment_id:
                    type: number
                    example: 18552260055
                    description: Payment identifier from the payment
                  amount:
                    type: number
                    example: 10
                    description: Refund amount
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Refund amount
                      spa: Monto de reembolso
                      por: Valor do reembolso
                  metadata:
                    type: array
                    description: Contains payment metadata that is sent to us in the payment post
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Contains payment metadata that is sent to us in the payment post
                      spa: Contiene metadatos del pago que nos envían en el post del payment
                      por: Contém metadados de pagamento que nos são enviados no post de payment
                    items:
                      type: object
                  source:
                    type: array
                    description: Contains the data to identify who originated the refund (contains ID, name and type)
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Contains the data to identify who originated the refund (contains ID, name and type)
                      spa: Contiene los datos para identificar quién originó el reembolso (contiene ID, name y type)
                      por: Contém os dados para identificar quem originou o reembolso (contém ID, nome e tipo)
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        name:
                          type: string
                          example: "Firstname Lastname"
                          x-example-i18n:
                            eng: Firstname Lastname
                            spa: Nombre y apellido
                            por: Nome e sobrenome
                          description: The name of the user who submitted the refund request  
                        id:
                          type: string
                          example: "1003743392"
                          description: The ID of the user who submitted the refund request (collector, operator, owner of the marketplace)
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: The ID of the user who submitted the refund request (collector, operator, owner of the marketplace)
                            spa: El ID del usuario que envió el pedido de reembolso (collector, operator, owner del marketplace)
                            por: O ID do usuário que enviou a solicitação de reembolso (coletor, operador e proprietário do marketplace)
                        type:
                          type: string
                          example: "collector"
                          description: Source type. The possible values are Admin, Collector, BPP, and Marketplace.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Source type. The possible values are Admin, Collector, BPP, and Marketplace.
                            spa: Tipo de fuente. Los valores posibles son Admin, Collector, BPP y Marketplace.
                            por: Tipo de fonte. Os valores possíveis são Admin, Collector, BPP e Marketplace.
                  date_created:
                    type: string
                    example: "2021-11-24T13:58:49.312-04:00"
                    format: date
                    description: Refund creation date
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Refund creation date
                      spa: Fecha de creación del reembolso
                      por: Data de criação do reembolso
                  unique_sequence_number:
                    type: string
                    example: null
                    description: It is an identifier of the refund that was generated by the card processor.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: It is an identifier of the refund that was generated by the card processor.
                      spa: Es un identificador del reembolso que generó el procesador de la tarjeta.
                      por: É um identificador do reembolso que foi gerado pelo processador do cartão.
                  refund_mode:
                    type: string
                    example: "standard"
                    description: Type of refund
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Type of refund
                      spa: Tipo de reembolso
                      por: Tipo de reembolso
                  adjustment_amount:
                    type: number
                    example: 0
                    description: Refund adjustment
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Refund adjustment
                      spa: Ajuste de reembolso
                      por: Ajuste de reembolso
                  status:
                    type: string
                    example: "approved"
                    description: Refund status
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Refund status
                      spa: Status de reembolso
                      por: Status de reembolso
                    enum:
                      - approved -- The payment has been approved and accredited.
                      - in_process -- Payment is being reviewed.
                      - rejected -- Payment was rejected. The user may retry payment.
                      - cancelled -- Payment was cancelled by one of the parties or because time for payment has expired.
                      - authorized -- The payment has been authorized but not captured yet.
                  reason:
                    type: string
                    example: null
                    description: Refund reason
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Refund reason
                      spa: Motivo de reembolso
                      por: Motivo do reembolso
                  label:
                    type: array
                    description: Information relevant to the refund. Currently only one label called hidden is used. When the payment search is made, refunds with the hidden label are not returned in the response JSON.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Information relevant to the refund. Currently only one label called hidden is used. When the payment search is made, refunds with the hidden label are not returned in the response JSON.
                      spa: Información pertinente al reembolso. Actualmente solo se usa una label llamada hidden. Cuando se hace la búsqueda del pago, en el JSON de respuesta no se devuelven los refunds que tienen el label hidden.
                      por: Informações relevantes para o reembolso. Atualmente, apenas uma label chamada hidden é usada. Quando a pesquisa de pagamento é feita, os reembolsos com o label hiddden não são retornados no JSON de resposta.
                    items:
                      type: object
                  partition_details:
                    type: array
                    description: Indicates the amount returned for each of the partitions with which the payment was generated. Currently, payments with several money partitions are created only for one product from Brazil (Valeras), so it does not apply to all. Valeras allows offering benefits to employees, and is currently turned on in Brazil only for some employers.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Indicates the amount returned for each of the partitions with which the payment was generated. Currently, payments with several money partitions are created only for one product from Brazil (Valeras), so it does not apply to all. Valeras allows offering benefits to employees, and is currently turned on in Brazil only for some employers.
                      spa: Indica el monto devuelto para cada una de las particiones con las que fue generado el pago. Actualmente solo para un producto de Brasil (Valeras) se crean pagos con varias particiones de dinero, por lo que no aplica a todos. Valeras permite ofrecer beneficios a empleados, y actualmente se encuentra encendido en Brasil solo para algunos empleadores.
                      por: Indica o valor devolvido para cada uma das partições com as quais o pagamento foi gerado. Atualmente apenas para um produto do Brasil (Valeras) são criados pagamentos com várias partições de dinheiro, portanto não se aplica a todos. O Valeras permite oferecer benefícios aos empregados e atualmente está ativo no Brasil apenas para alguns empregadores.
                    items:
                      type: object     
        '400':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 400--Bad-Request--missing-information-on-header-            
        '401':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 5--Must-provide-your-access-token-to-proceed--Valid-token-required-
        '404':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 2000--Payment-not-found--Payment_Id_does_not_exist-
                      - 2032--Refund-not-found--Refund_Id_does_not_exist-
  /v1/payments/{payment_id}:
    put:
      tags:

      summary: Create cancellation
